scripts.clean: rimraf -f build && rimraf -f browser && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir ts && mkdir rollup && mkdir terser && cd .. && mkdir browser
scripts.terser: terser -c passes=2 -m --sequences 40 build/rollup/peg.umd.js > build/terser/peggy.umd.min.js && terser -c passes=2 -m --sequences 40 --module build/rollup/peg.esmodule.js > build/terser/peggy.esmodule.min.js
scripts.newbuild: npm run clean && npm run set_version && npm run ts && npm run rollup && npm run terser && npm run jest
scripts.build: npm run browser:build && npm run benchmark:build && npm run test:build
scripts.postbrowser:build: node tools/header browser/peggy.min.js && cp browser/peggy.min.js docs/vendor/peggy/peggy.min.js
scripts.benchmark:build: browserify benchmark/browser.stub.js -o docs/js/benchmark-bundle.min.js && node tools/header docs/js/benchmark-bundle.min.js
scripts.test:build: browserify test/browser.stub.js -o docs/js/test-bundle.min.js && node tools/header docs/js/test-bundle.min.js
